005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.TypeMetapathException;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
013
014/**
015 * Provides a variety of utilities for working with Metapath items.
016 */
017public final class ItemUtils {
018
019  private ItemUtils() {
020    // disable construction
021  }
022
023  /**
024   * Checks that the item is a node item.
025   *
026   * @param item
027   *          the item to check
028   * @return the item cast to a {@link INodeItem}
029   * @throws TypeMetapathException
030   *           if the item is {@code null} or not an {@link INodeItem}
031   */
032  // FIXME: make this a method on the type implementation
033  @NonNull
034  public static INodeItem checkItemIsNodeItemForStep(@Nullable IItem item) {
035    if (item instanceof INodeItem) {
036      return (INodeItem) item;
037    }
038    if (item == null) {
039      throw new TypeMetapathException(TypeMetapathException.NOT_A_NODE_ITEM_FOR_STEP,
040          "Item is null.");
041    }
042    throw new TypeMetapathException(TypeMetapathException.NOT_A_NODE_ITEM_FOR_STEP,
043        String.format(
044            "The item of type '%s' is not a INodeItem.",
045            item.getClass().getName()));
046  }
047
048  /**
049   * Check that the item is the type specified by {@code clazz}.
050   *
051   * @param <TYPE>
052   *          the Java type the item is required to match
053   * @param item
054   *          the item to check
055   * @param clazz
056   *          the Java class to check the item against
057   * @return the item cast to the required class value
058   * @throws TypeMetapathException
059   *           if the item is {@code null} or does not match the type specified by
060   *           {@code clazz}
061   */
062  // FIXME: make this a method on the type implementation
063  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
064  @NonNull
065  public static <TYPE> TYPE checkItemType(@NonNull IItem item, @NonNull Class<TYPE> clazz) {
066    if (clazz.isInstance(item)) {
067      return (TYPE) item;
068    }
069    throw new TypeMetapathException(TypeMetapathException.INVALID_TYPE_ERROR,
070        String.format(
071            "The item of type '%s' is not the required type '%s'.",
072            item.getClass().getName(),
073            clazz.getName()));
074  }
075}
